GENERAL_INPUT_PATTERN_ERROR: This field contains an incorrect format
HEADER_CONFIRMATION_BACK_MODAL_DESCRIPTI: Are you sure you want to go back to the beginning? If you do, the changes won't be save
KEEP_ALIVE_END_TIME_TEXT: Your session timed out because the browser was idle.
KEEP_ALIVE_END_TIME_TEXT_2: If you want, you can perform a new search for flights to your destination.
KEEP_ALIVE_END_TIME_TITLE: Your session has expired but you can perform a new search here
KEEP_ALIVE_TIMER_TEXT_2: Please press the "Keep Session Alive" button to stay connected.
KEEP_ALIVE_TIMER_TITLE: Still not made up your mind?
SUBSCRIPTION_MODELS_CONFIRM_CONSULT: Alternatively, you can send us your queries and suggestions through our Twitter account:
SUBSCRIPTION_MODELS_CONFIRM_HELP_INFO: We're here to answer all your queries about your trip: baggage, documents, airports and much more
SUBSCRIPTION_MODELS_CONFIRM_IBERIA_PLUS_: Discover the Iberia Plus experience and change the way you travel
SUBSCRIPTION_MODELS_IMPORT_ERROR_BETWEEN: The amount must be between XXX and YYYY.
SUBSCRIPTION_MODELS_CONDITION_MODAL_HEAD: Table of terms and conditions of use for subscription models
SUBSCRIPTION_MODELS_CONFIRMATION_CONFIRM: Your Discount Plan has been issued with code {{emission_code}}. You will shortly receive a confirmation email at
SUBSCRIPTION_MODELS_CONFIRMATION_REMEMBE: Remember, your Savings Plan is valid for one year to use for at least two trips. If you choose the Frequent Companion option, this will always have to be same person you indicated when you purchased your Savings Plan.
SUBSCRIPTION_MODELS_MODAL_BACK_SUBTITLE: If you do, your Savings Plan settings will be lost.
SUBSCRIPTION_MODELS_MODAL_BACK_TITLE: Do you want to exit the Savings Plan purchase process?
SUBSCRIPTION_MODELS_MAIN_TEXT: If you fly to a particular destination in Spain on a regular basis, purchase an Iberia Savings Plan, add the amount you want and use it to fly to your usual destination. The higher the amount you add to your plan, the greater your savings.
SUBSCRIPTION_MODELS_TARGET_PRICE: Approximate price based on the origin and destination that can be used for return trips in your Savings Plan, and with the most popular options requested by the majority of user (not including extras).
SUBSCRIPTION_MODELS_REGULARLY: Do you fly to a particular destination in Spain or Europe on a regular basis?
SUBSCRIPTION_MODELS_VIEW_ERROR_TITLE: Sorry, this function is temporarily unavailable.
SUBSCRIPTION_MODELS_VIEW_ERROR_SUBTITLE: Please try again in a few minutes
